name: 20L Small Hiking Backpack for Women - Lightweight Packable Backpack for Men, Waterproof Foldable Daypack for Travel, Hiking, and Daily Use, Adjustable Chest Strap Multiple Pockets, Black
short_description: [Foldable & Ultra-Lightweight Design] This foldable backpack is designed for ultimate portability! With a spacious 20L capacity, lightweight backpack for travel measures 17.3 x 11 x 5.1 inches when unfolded, yet folds down to a compact 6.1 x 8 x 2.7 inches for easy storage. Weighing just 0.66 pounds, small hiking backpack is the perfect lightweight companion for travel, hiking, or daily commutes.

[Durable & Water-Resistant Nylon Material] Crafted from high-quality thickened nylon, this waterproof hiking backpack is built to withstand your adventures. It’s splash-proof, scratch-resistant, and keeps your belongings safe and dry in light rain or damp conditions. (Note: Not suitable for submersion in water or heavy rain.

[Smart Storage & Organization] Stay organized on the go! This backpack features a main compartment for larger items, a front zipper pocket for quick access, two shoulder strap pockets (the left side fits a 7-inch phone, while the right side has a mesh elastic bag for snacks or small essentials), two side mesh pockets for water bottles or umbrellas, and a hidden anti-theft zipper pocket to keep your valuables secure.

[Comfortable & Secure for Outdoor Adventures] Designed for comfort and safety, this hiking backpack includes thickened shoulder straps for reduced pressure, an adjustable chest strap for a snug fit, a built-in safety whistle for emergencies, and reflective strips for enhanced visibility in low-light conditions.

[Versatile for Every Occasion] Whether you’re hiking, traveling, commuting, or exploring the city, this packable backpack is your go-to solution. Its lightweight, foldable, and functional design makes it ideal for outdoor adventures, daily use, or as a compact travel companion.

[Environmentally Friendly Packaging Method] In order to practice environmental protection, we have compactly folded and packaged our backpacks. When you first open them, there may be some wrinkles on the surface, which is a normal phenomenon. You just need to simply stretch and iron them, or use them normally for a day or two with items inside, and the wrinkles will naturally disappear, without affecting the quality and function of the backpack at all.
